  • Increases available Pools of Devotion by +1.

addons.name: Worship Tablet
addons.description:
A stone tablet adorned with gold, showing the drawings and writings of a corrupted incantation used originally to worship forgotten deities.
  • Increases Ingestion speed by +100 %.
  • Increases Movement speed while holding Corrupt Purge by +4.4 %.

addons.name: Vile Emetic
addons.description:
A foul-smelling and half-congealed potion of unidentifiable ingredients.
Consumed to rapidly induce vomiting.
Used to purge evil from the body.
  • Increases Projectile speed of Vile Purge and Corrupt Purge by +10 %.

addons.name: Severed Toe
addons.description:
The decaying severed toe of Adiris, weaved on a thread and worn as an amulet around the neck.
Radiates with vile power.
  • Increases Infection gained from interacting with Objects by +50 %.

addons.name: Devotee's Amulet
addons.description:
A blood stone amulet carved intricately with the effigy of the Babylonian God of Mayhem and Pestilence.
Fills the wearer with boundless devotion.
  • Increases duration of Corrupt Purge by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Seal
addons.description:
A translucent cylindrical seal moulded from The Fog itself with the effigy of The Plague.
Its surface is warm and pulsates with The Entity's power.
  • Each time a Generator is completed, The Plague is automatically granted Corrupt Purge.
  • Reduces duration of Corrupt Purge by -20 seconds.

addons.name: Black Incense
addons.description:
A dark paste made of sharp osseous shavings.
The inhaling of its foul fumes sharpens the mind's eye.
  • The Auras of infected Survivors are revealed to you for 3 seconds when they vomit.

addons.name: "Philly"
addons.description:
A stolen camera from a victim of Olsen in Philadelphia, where he worked before.
The film inside captured his last night in the city.
  • Reduces the time required to Mark a Survivor by -20 %.

addons.name: Walleyes Matchbook
addons.description:
A sheet of matches from Walleyes, a small bar in Northern Roseville.
A victim's phone number is scribbled in blue.
One of the incriminating pieces of evidence found.
  • Reduces the Power Recovery time by -6 seconds.

addons.name: Headlines Cut-outs
addons.description:
Cut-outs of articles covering unsolved murder cases from Utah to Pennsylvania.
While The Ghost Face just authored some of the headlines, he committed all of the murders.
Compiling your success makes you proud and boosts your confidence.
  • Increases Movement speed while Stalking by +40 %.

addons.name: Cheap Cologne
addons.description:
Dollar store cologne with a pungent scent of rubbing alcohol.
Worn by The Ghost Face to make his presence known.
Reserved for impromptu visits.
  • Increases the time Survivors stay Marked by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Telephoto Lens
addons.description:
A manual focus lens to remain undetected while taking pictures from afar.
  • Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Cinch Straps
addons.description:
Black straps that keep everything in place while on the prowl.
  • Night Shroud remains active after missing a Basic Attack.

addons.name: Olsen's Journal
addons.description:
A spiral notebook filled with stained, handwritten entries.
The journal details different equipment used to stalk victims.
Going through your past methods triggers thrilling memories.
  • Marked Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect until the Mark expires.

addons.name: Olsen's Address Book
addons.description:
Filled in blunt, blue crabbed writing.
All the Roseville murder victims are listed there, along with their phone number and address.
  • Marked Survivors rushing an action reveal their Aura for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Marked Map
addons.description:
The annotated map of Northern Roseville, Florida.
Each 'X' represents a victim of The Ghost Face.
Mapping out your targets allows you to roam the streets undetected.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration when The Ghost Face is revealed by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Olsen's Wallet
addons.description:
Olsen's wallet holds thirty dollars in cash, a video club membership card, and a folded picture of Olsen's first Roseville victim.
Carrying incriminating evidence boosts your excitement and resolve.
  • Breaking a Pallet or Breakable Wall immediately recharges Night Shroud.

addons.name: Leather Knife Sheath
addons.description:
A quiet and flexible sheath to carry your blade.
Movement is easier when things are fastened into place.
  • Increases Crouch Movement speed by +10 %.

addons.name: Lasting Perfume
addons.description:
An overpowering musky fragrance worn by The Ghost Face to announce his presence.
Reserved for the victims he planned to write about.
  • Increases the time hooked Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.

addons.name: Knife Belt Clip
addons.description:
A perfect belt clip to scout carry your blade discreetly.
No one knows what you are planning to do tonight.
  • Reduces the Terror Radius of The Ghost Face by -8 metres while crouching.

addons.name: Chewed Pen
addons.description:
A blue pen with a chewed cap that holds traces of Danny's DNA.
Incriminating evidence that was never found.
  • Increases the time dying Survivors take to reveal The Ghost Face to 3 seconds.

addons.name: Victim's Detailed Routine
addons.description:
A ripped page outlining the weekly routine of Olsen's first victim in Roseville.
Compiling your victim's habits allows you to anticipate their movements.
  • Whenever a Survivor is Marked by The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Night Vision Monocular
addons.description:
Night vision lens enabling sharp photos even when shrouded in darkness.
Ideal for discreet, impromptu visits late at night.
  • Whenever a Survivor reveals The Ghost Face, they suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Drop-Leg Knife Sheath
addons.description:
A sheath allowing for a full motion range:
ideal to inflict quick and powerful wounds while moving freely.
Stolen from a patrol officer the night Danny left Philadelphia.
  • Grants a 10 % Haste Status Effect for 5 seconds after Marking a Survivor.

addons.name: Driver's License
addons.description:
A driver's license revealing Olsen's true identity:
Danny Johnson.
  • When Marking a Survivor repairing a Generator, the Generator explodes and loses -20 % of its Progression.
  • The affected Generator becomes blocked for the next 15 seconds.
  • Marking multiple Survivors on the same Generator will only apply the penalty once.

addons.name: "Ghost Face Caught on Tape"
addons.description:
A tape obtained by Olsen to write an article that terrorised Roseville.
  • Putting a Survivor into the Dying State with a Basic Attack immediately recharges Night Shroud.

addons.name: Outdoor Security Camera
addons.description:
A small surveillance camera that filmed The Ghost Face breaking into a house on Belleview Road in Northern Roseville.
The camera was positioned at the perfect angle to catch a glimpse of The Ghost Face without providing any real clue to the police.
  • Putting a Marked Survivor into the Dying State reveals the Auras of all Survivors for 7 seconds.

addons.name: Rotten Pumpkin
addons.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.
  • Traversing the Upside Down destroys the Portal entered by The Demogorgon.
  • Grants 200 bonus Bloodpoints for traversing the Upside Down.

addons.name: Black Heart
addons.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.
  • Decreases the Attack cool-down of successful Shred Attacks by -15 %.

addons.name: Rat Liver
addons.description:
A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.
  • Increases Movement speed while charging Of the Abyss by +3.5 %.

addons.name: Rat Tail
addons.description:
A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.
  • Increases the Opening speed of Portals by +35 %.

addons.name: Sticky Lining
addons.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the Killer Instinct's Detection range by +2.5 metres.

addons.name: Viscous Webbing
addons.description:
Wet, elastic webs that broaden the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the Sealing time of Portals by +16 %.

addons.name: Rotten Green Tripe
addons.description:
Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.
  • Increases the Traversing speed between Portals by +15 %.

addons.name: Mews' Guts
addons.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.
  • Increases available Portals by +1 Portal.
  • Decreases the Attack Cool-down of missed Shred Attacks by -11 %.

addons.name: Barb's Glasses
addons.description:
A broken pair of glasses that travelled to the Upside Down.
  • Decreases the Pallet Break cool-down of Shred by -15 %.

addons.name: Eleven's Soda
addons.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.
  • Shows the Auras of Generators being repaired in yellow while traversing the Upside Down.

addons.name: Thorny Vines
addons.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the Killer Instinct's Detection range by +1 metre.
  • Increases the time Survivors require to seal Portals by +11 %.

addons.name: Brass Case Lighter
addons.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.
  • Survivors under the effect of an activated Portal suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
    • This effect lingers for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Violet Waxcap
addons.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Deer Lung
addons.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.
  • Increases the Traversing speed between Portals by +30 %.
  • Reduces available Portals by -2 Portals.

addons.name: Lifeguard Whistle
addons.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.
  • Survivors near activated Portals are indicated by Killer Instinct without having to charge Of the Abyss.
  • Reduces the Killer Instinct's Detection range by -1 metre.

addons.name: Vermilion Webcap
addons.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Upside Down Resin
addons.description:
A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the inter-dimensional tunnels.
  • Increases the time Survivors require to seal Portals by +40 %.

addons.name: Unknown Egg
addons.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.
  • Increases Power Recovery time by -1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Leprose Lichen
addons.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.
  • Reveals the Aura of all Survivors while traversing the Upside Down and for 3 seconds after emerging from a Portal.

addons.name: Red Moss
addons.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +8 seconds.
  • Suppresses all noises The Demogorgon usually makes while emerging from a Portal.
  • Increases the Portal Emerging time by +15 %.

addons.name: Rotting Rope
addons.description:
Had the rope been stronger it would have likely held Kazan.
As it was, he escaped and butchered his captors.
  • Increases the Aura Detection range of Blood Orbs by +2 metres.

addons.name: Paper Lantern
addons.description:
Perhaps a memento of simpler times, before rage fully enveloped him.
  • Increases the Movement speed of Blood Orbs while attracted to The Oni by +4 m/s.

addons.name: Cracked Sakazuki
addons.description:
A cup from Kazan's wedding ceremony.
It never made it through the night before being damaged.
  • Reduces the Activation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Deactivation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Blackened Toenail
addons.description:
Fell off during one of Kazan's hundred winter treks to the temple.
Despite his pilgrimage, Akito's leg would never heal.
  • Increases The Oni's Movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by +0.3 m/s.

addons.name: Polished Maedate
addons.description:
A horned crest Kazan tore from his helmet after being compared to a demon.
  • Increases the Passive Power Charge rate by +0.1 c/s.

addons.name: Ink Lion
addons.description:
An ink painting that once hung in the Yamaoka Estate.
Depicts the story of a lion eaten by mice.
  • Reduces the Activation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Deactivation time of Blood Fury by -0.5 seconds.
  • Reduces the Duration penalty of Blood Fury when downing a Survivor by -2 seconds.

addons.name: Chipped Saihai
addons.description:
A baton that belonged to Renjiro.
It was stolen by Kazan upon his departure.
  • Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +6 seconds.

addons.name: Child's Wooden Sword
addons.description:
Akito's practice sword.
The child had little use for it after his injury.
  • Increases the Aura Detection range of Blood Orbs by +3 metres.

addons.name: Bloody Sash
addons.description:
Blood from a boy who called Kazan "The Noble Impostor". Kazan hid evidence of the fight from his father, often revelling at the sash in secret.
  • Increases' The Oni's Movement speed while absorbing Blood Orbs by +0.6 m/s.

addons.name: Yamaoka Sashimono
addons.description:
The banner of the Yamaoka family, Kazan felt an overwhelming pride from it.
  • Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +8 seconds.

addons.name: Wooden Oni Mask
addons.description:
A mask that a young Kazan bought to celebrate Setsubun, its repulsively fanged mouth began haunting his nightmares.
  • Increases the Frequency of Survivors dropping Blood Orbs by +14 %.
  • Survivors drop 1 additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw Pallets, exit Lockers, crouch, or fail a Skill Check.

addons.name: Shattered Wakizashi
addons.description:
The fragments of an ancestral blade, destroyed by Kazan in a fit of rage.
  • Increases the Passive Power Charge rate by +0.2 c/s.

addons.name: Scalped Topknot
addons.description:
The topknot of a samurai who questioned Kazan's honour.
The roots cling to a thin strip of bloody skin.
  • Reduces the Activation time of a Demon Dash by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Kanai-Anzen Talisman
addons.description:
A trinket given to Kazan at birth, its powers are meant to protect his family from harm.
  • Increases The Oni's Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +0.64 m/s.

addons.name: Tear Soaked Tenugui
addons.description:
The cloth that Kazan's mother cried into when he left on his pilgrimage to cleanse the samurai.
  • Reduces the Duration penalty of Blood Fury when downing a Survivor by -4 seconds.

addons.name: Splintered Hull
addons.description:
Fragments of a ship that carried Renjiro Yamaoka.
Against all odds, the legendary samurai seemed to survive.
  • Increases the Frequency of Survivors dropping Blood Orbs by +33 %.
  • Survivors drop 1 additional Blood Orb when they vault, throw Pallets, exit Lockers, crouch, or fail a Skill Check.

addons.name: Lion Fang
addons.description:
A tooth sold from an exotic vendor, it symbolises power and nobility.
  • Increases the Duration of Blood Fury by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Akito's Crutch
addons.description:
The crutch used by Kazan's son after falling from a tree.
Akito's playmate and her family were punished for the boy's injury.
  • Increases The Oni's Movement speed during a Demon Dash by +1.0 m/s.

addons.name: Renjiro's Bloody Glove
addons.description:
The glove Renjiro held to his sternum following the strike dealt by his son Kazan.
  • Blood Orbs are visible to Survivors.
  • A Survivor coming into contact with a Blood Orb absorbs it, but has their Aura revealed to you for 2 seconds.
    • This effect stacks for each absorbed Blood Orb.

addons.name: Iridescent Family Crest
addons.description:
A crest that denotes its owner as being a part of the Yamaoka family.
  • Missing a Demon Strike will cause all Survivors within 24 metres of your location to scream and reveal their location to you.

addons.name: Spit Polish Rag
addons.description:
A grimy piece of burlap.
Spit and elbow grease was enough to wipe down the Speargun in the heat of a shootout.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Snake Oil
addons.description:
A tincture of oils and extracts purchased from a travelling salesman.
Purported to cure all that ails you.
  • Increases the Reeling speed by +5 %.

addons.name: Rickety Chain
addons.description:
Weak steel links first used on Caleb's prototype Speargun.
Despite the chain's failings, it holds sentimental value.
  • Grants 50 % bonus Bloodpoints for Speared Score Events.
  • Increases the rate at which Survivors break free from The Redeemer by +33 %.

addons.name: Modified Ammo Belt
addons.description:
An old ammo belt Caleb altered for his specialised weaponry.
Still holds the fine red dirt of the Arizona Territory desert.
  • Reduces the Reload time by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Rusted Spike
addons.description:
A railroad spike that Caleb fastened to the front of the Speargun during a moment of morbid curiosity.
The dull tip prevents it from cleanly piercing its target.
  • Survivors hit with The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

addons.name: Poison Oak Leaves
addons.description:
An ordinary-looking plant, Caleb found out that spears coated in its oil cause unbearable blistering around wound.
  • Increases Mending time by +1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Marshal's Badge
addons.description:
A silver badge taken from the corpse of a lawman in Arizona Territory who interfered with the Hellshire Gang's bounties.
  • Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -4 metres while Aiming Down Sights.

addons.name: Jaw Smasher
addons.description:
The bullet that ripped through Caleb's jaw during a frenzy shootout.
It brings back burning desire for revenge.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +1 %.

addons.name: Chewing Tobacco
addons.description:
A can of clipped and sweetened tobacco leaves lifted from a gutted body in Glenvale.
Stimulates the nervous system.
  • Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Warden's Keys
addons.description:
The dull jangle of the keys evokes a furious memory within Caleb.
  • Reduces the Reload time by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Wanted Poster
addons.description:
The yellowed remains of a wanted poster for Mason Kelly.
It kept Caleb focused on the hunt.
  • Increases the Movement speed of The Deathslinger while Aiming Down Sights by +2.5 %.

addons.name: Tin Oil Can
addons.description:
A can holding a small amount of oil to reduce friction in machinery.
Early models of the Speargun were notorious for jamming, and oil had to be readily available.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time after missed shots with The Redeemer by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Honey Locust Thorn
addons.description:
Angered with a bounty who fled twice before, Caleb twisted thorn branches onto a spear and let it loose.
  • Survivors breaking free from The Redeemer suffer from the Mangled Status Effect until healed.

addons.name: Bayshore's Gold Tooth
addons.description:
A golden tooth torn from Henry Bayshore as he screamed for mercy, hours before he was finished off.
  • Increases the Reeling speed by +9 %.

addons.name: Prison Chain
addons.description:
A thick, heavy chain that once held a steel ball and latched to Caleb's ankle.
It has been re-purposed to hook onto a spear.
  • Increases the time required for Survivors to break free from The Redeemer by +10 %.

addons.name: Gold Creek Whiskey
addons.description:
Warm comfort in a bottle that quelled Caleb's anger and slowed his step.
  • Reduces the Terror Radius of The Deathslinger by -8 metres while Aiming Down Sights.

addons.name: Bayshore's Cigar
addons.description:
A quality cigar, plucked from the jacket of Caleb's boss while he wailed over the spear lodged in his abdomen.
  • Reduces the Stun duration when Survivors break free from The Redeemer by -1 second.

addons.name: Barbed Wire
addons.description:
Pliable American-made steel lined with sharp barbs.
Despite its simplicity, Caleb found it could be wrapped around a spear to increase its viciousness.
  • Increases Mending time by +3.5 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Coin
addons.description:
A glass-like coin moulded from The Fog itself.
A payment to the bounty hunter for the services rendered.
  • Survivors speared by The Redeemer from at least 12 metres away suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for as long as they remain speared.

addons.name: Hellshire Iron
addons.description:
The Hellshire Gang's branding iron.
Despite folklore, it never made its mark on new initiates, instead having been used to brand particularly quarrelsome bounties.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for as long as a Survivor is speared by The Redeemer.
    • This effect lingers for an additional 10 seconds.

addons.name: Lead Ring
addons.description:
Found in a refrigerator. It's engraved with a disgusting, bloated face.
  • Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +10 seconds.

addons.name: Dead Butterfly
addons.description:
A butterfly found on a bed at Wood Side Apartments. It's frail and nearly falls apart when touched.
  • Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -2 seconds.

addons.name: Copper Ring
addons.description:
Found in the basement of Brookhaven Hospital. It's engraved with a picture of a spider.
  • Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +1 second.

addons.name: Black Strap
addons.description:
A nylon strap that was used to restrain a victim to a metal frame. The colour makes it difficult to see the blood-soaked into it.
  • Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +0.5 metres.

addons.name: Wax Doll
addons.description:
A doll carved from wax, handcrafted by a prisoner who would soon face their judgement.
  • Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1 metre.

addons.name: Spearhead
addons.description:
The sharp, rusted tip of a spear. It's flaked with blood from its last victim.
  • Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by 1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Leopard-Print Fabric
addons.description:
A shred of pink, leopard-print fabric. It's difficult to tell what it was used for.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Forgotten Videotape
addons.description:
A videotape of two lovers vacationing in Silent Hill. Despite its sentimental value, it was left behind in the Lakeview Hotel.
  • Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -3 seconds.

addons.name: Cinderella Music Box
addons.description:
A music box with a figure from the fairy tale Cinderella, found inside a suitcase adorned with stickers from multiple destinations.
  • Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +15 seconds.

addons.name: Valtiel Sect Photograph
addons.description:
A photograph of two figures in red hoods. Entitled Crimson and White Banquet for the Gods.
  • Reduces Rites of Judgement Recharge time by -4 seconds.

addons.name: Tablet of the Oppressor
addons.description:
A metal tablet engraved with Aztec figures.
  • Increases Rites of Judgement Power duration by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Misty Day, Remains of Judgement
addons.description:
A painting of an imposing figure wearing a steel pyramid atop his head. Victims are caged in the background.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +1 second.

addons.name: Mannequin Foot
addons.description:
The smooth grey foot of a mannequin, brutally torn from its leg.
  • Increases the duration Rites of Judgement trails remain in the environment by +20 seconds.

addons.name: Burning Man Painting
addons.description:
A diagram of the Lakeview Hotel. Red flames are painted over this place of guilt.
  • Increases Punishment of the Damned Attack range by +1.5 metres.

addons.name: Scarlet Egg
addons.description:
A fresh egg, strikingly red in colour, about the size of a quail's egg.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration when triggered by Rites of Judgement by +1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Rust-Coloured Egg
addons.description:
An old-looking egg, coloured reddish orange, about the size of a quail's egg.
  • Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Lost Memories Book
addons.description:
A book about the history and legends of Silent Hill and the surrounding area.
  • Survivors affected by Rites of Judgement suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Crimson Ceremony Book
addons.description:
A book about an ancient god. Author unknown.
  • Injured Survivors affected by Torment suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect.

addons.name: Obsidian Goblet
addons.description:
An ancient looking goblet carved from pure obsidian.
  • The Executioner gains the Undetectable Status Effect when standing on a Rites of Judgement trail.

addons.name: Iridescent Seal of Metatron
addons.description:
A talisman with an odd design inscribed on it. The Entity's influence seems to have altered it.
  • When sending a Survivor to a Cage of Atonement, the Auras of all Survivors suffering from Torment are revealed for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Placebo Tablet
addons.description:
A pill that's utterly ineffective... or is it?
  • Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Rush Score Events in the Deviousness Category.
  • Decreases Rush Movement speed by -15 %.

addons.name: Foxglove
addons.description:
A poisonous plant that sparked Talbot's interest in chemistry. It rekindles deeply buried memories.
  • Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.25 seconds.

addons.name: Compound Seven
addons.description:
This early sample failed to achieve desired results, but demonstrated surprising effects regardless.
  • Automatically face the nearest Survivor within 16 metres after a Slam.

addons.name: Chipped Monocle
addons.description:
A monocle Talbot rarely used despite his eyesight weakening in later years.
  • Displays the target location of a Slam.

addons.name: Shredded Notes
addons.description:
The remnants of Talbot's notes, they still contain some valuable information within.
  • Reduces Token Regeneration time by -0.33 seconds per Token.
  • Decreases available Rush Tokens by 1.

addons.name: Pustula Dust
addons.description:
Dried Pustula Petals ground into a fine dust.
  • Increases Slam duration by +0.75 seconds.

addons.name: Plague Bile
addons.description:
A sample of The Plague's bile, distilled and treated with a mixture of chemicals.
  • Increases Rush Turn rate by +10 %.

addons.name: Canker Thorn
addons.description:
A sizeable thorn snipped from a Visceral Canker. It secretes a mild toxin.
  • Reduces Rush Fatigue time by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Blighted Rat
addons.description:
A rat that briefly returned to life when injected with Putrid Serum, becoming aggressive and uncontrollable.
  • Increases Rush Movement speed by +4 % for each consecutive Rush.

addons.name: Umbra Salts
addons.description:
Regular sea salt that has momentarily passed through the Spirit World, altering its properties in the process.
  • Increases Rush Turn rate by +15 %.

addons.name: Rose Tonic
addons.description:
A mixture made with dried roses from the exceedingly rare New Moon Bouquet.
  • Increases Slam duration by +1 second.

addons.name: Compound Twenty-One
addons.description:
A serum that's fatal to humans. It evokes beneficial qualities in those who are... something more.
  • When initiating a Slam, reveal the Aura of Survivors within 8 metres of the collision location for 3.5 seconds.

addons.name: Blighted Crow
addons.description:
A dead crow that has been grotesquely mutated by Putrid Serum.
  • Increases Rush Movement speed by +6 % for each consecutive Rush.

addons.name: Adrenaline Vial
addons.description:
A hormone removed from an unwilling subject's adrenal gland. Though it provides a jolt of energy, it can fatigue its user.
  • Reduces the Token Regeneration time by -1 second per Token.
  • Increases the maximum Look angle during a Rush by +50 %.
  • Increases the available Rush Tokens by +2 Tokens.
  • Increases the Rush Movement speed by +10 %.
  • Decreases the Rush Turn rate by -0.5 °/s.

addons.name: Vigo's Journal
addons.description:
The journal of a man who claimed to have returned from The Void. The knowledge within has practical applications.
  • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect while Rushing.

addons.name: Summoning Stone
addons.description:
Talbot used this stone to carve what he believed was his research into the Opium Den's walls.
  • Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will call upon The Entity to block Pallets within a radius of 16 metres of your location for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Soul Chemical
addons.description:
A chemical squeezed from the pineal gland of a recently deceased Survivor.
  • During a Rush, the moment The Blight comes within 16 metres of a Survivor who is repairing or healing, trigger a tremendously difficult Skill Check for that Survivor.
Soul Chemical can activate once per Survivor per Rush.
Soul Chemical does not trigger for a Rush started within 16 metres of the Survivor.

addons.name: Alchemist's Ring
addons.description:
A ring given to chemists graduating from the London School of Medicine. It's a reminder of unrestrained ambition.
  • Hitting a Survivor with a Lethal Rush will instantly recharge all Rush Tokens.

addons.name: Iridescent Blight Tag
addons.description:
A glass-like laboratory tag, moulded from The Fog itself. Either a gift from The Entity or a cruel jest to tag The Blight as he once did to others.
  • Upon using all Rush Tokens, your last Lethal Rush will put Survivors into the Dying State.

addons.name: Compound Thirty-Three
addons.description:
Talbot's penultimate attempt at a serum. Though it did not facilitate his escape, it did have powerful side effects.
  • Any Survivor within 16 metres of a Slam will suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds, reducing their Movement speed by -3 %.
  • Slamming into Pallets and Breakable Walls immediately destroys them, incurring a Cool-down of 1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Toy Sword
addons.description:
A minuscule toy sword, only a few inches long.
Holding it brought out a violent enthusiasm in Victor.
  • Decreases Pounce Charge time by -0.2 seconds.

addons.name: Tiny Fingernail
addons.description:
Charlotte had many ways to mourn Victor's death.
As the fingernails loosened from his rotting hands, she took one in remembrance.
  • Reduces Victor's Unbinding time by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Soured Milk
addons.description:
A metal bottle filled with milk that has since soured.
Loud as Victor could be, he quieted down when presented with his meal.
  • Increases Victor's Shriek radius by +2 metres.

addons.name: Cat Figurine
addons.description:
A wooden figure that had caught young Victor's eye.
He shrieked until his mother stole it from the market, nearly blowing their cover.
  • Displays the target location of a Pounce.

addons.name: Madeleine's Glove
addons.description:
A glove once owned by The Twins' mother.
During desperate times, it was held over Victor's mouth to keep him from making a peep.
  • Increases Victor's Shriek radius by +4 metres.

addons.name: Ceremonial Candelabrum
addons.description:
The candelabrum that Victor tipped over, causing his captors to burn.
A symbol of his tenacity.
  • Increases time needed for Survivors to crush Victor by +0.2 seconds.

addons.name: Cat's Eye
addons.description:
An eyeball that belonged to a cat eaten by the starving Deshayes family.
Victor hid it from his mother, using it as a toy.
  • After fully charging Pounce, Victor roams silently.

addons.name: Bloody Black Hood
addons.description:
A hood from one of the men that hunted Charlotte.
Soon, he became the prey.
  • Reduces Cool-down time when switching to Charlotte by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Baby Teeth
addons.description:
Two teeth that Victor lost long ago.
They are unusually sharp.
  • Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Blindness Status Effect for 30 seconds.

addons.name: Weighty Rattle
addons.description:
A shoddily carved rattle that Victor cried over until his mother stole it for him.
It is entirely too heavy to be trusted to a child.
  • Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Broken Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Stale Biscuit
addons.description:
A hard, unleavened biscuit that Madeleine stole from a town's market.
It was not much, but it was better than most meals
  • Decreases Victor's Pounce cool-down by -0.4 seconds.

addons.name: Sewer Sludge
addons.description:
A disgusting, sticky mixture that covered the Deshayes during an escape attempt through the city sewers.
  • Increases time needed for Survivors to remove Victor by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Rusted Needle
addons.description:
A needle Madeleine used to sew up her children's tattered clothes.
  • Survivors removing Victor suffer from the Haemorrhage Status Effect until healed.

addons.name: Madeleine's Scarf
addons.description:
A cloth Madeleine wore shortly before her death.
The Twins kept it as a memento.
  • Increases Victor's Movement speed by +0.3 m/s.

addons.name: Victor's Soldier
addons.description:
A toy soldier Victor clung to when scared.
Something about it evoked jealousy in Charlotte.
  • If a Survivor crushes Victor while he's idle, their Aura is revealed for to Charlotte for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Spinning Top
addons.description:
A wooden top shared between The Twins, though Victor wanted it for his own.
He learned he could get what he wanted if he clung tightly and screamed.
  • Survivors drop any carried Item when pounced on by Victor.

addons.name: Forest Stew
addons.description:
A stew of foraged vegetables mixed with moss and bark to create a false sense of fullness.
  • Increases Victor's Movement speed by +0.6 m/s.

addons.name: Drop of Perfume
addons.description:
One of the few luxuries Madeleine escaped her past life with.
It has a pleasant, disarming scent.
  • When controlling Charlotte, Survivors within Victor's Shriek radius suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

addons.name: Silencing Cloth
addons.description:
A coarse strip of cloth that a five-year-old Charlotte would put in her mouth.
Stopped her from screaming when witch hunters were nearby.
  • After waking from her Dormant State, Charlotte is granted the Undetectable Status Effect for 20 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Pendant
addons.description:
A glass-like pendant moulded from The Fog itself.
There is a portrait of Madeleine Deshayes upon it, though something about her depiction seems unsettling.
  • If a Survivor crushes Victor while he's idle, they suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 45 seconds.

addons.name: Trick Pouch
addons.description:
A pouch with a number of hidden pockets.
Used by aspiring magicians and those with something to hide.
  • Start with 4 extra Blades.
  • Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 4.

addons.name: Memento Blades
addons.description:
Blood-rusted knives, worn from overuse.
Employed during Ji-Woon's early murders, they hold a place of importance in his heart.
  • Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Showstopper Score Events.
  • Increases each Survivor's Laceration Meter capacity by +1 Charge.

addons.name: Killing Part Chords
addons.description:
A set of chords that Ji-Woon never found a song for.
Still, the sound is undeniably catchy.
  • Slightly increases Throw State Movement speed by +1 %.

addons.name: Inferno Wires
addons.description:
Burnt wires form the studio fire that killed four of the five NO SPIN members.
Their deaths gave rise to The Trickster.
  • Increases Main Event duration by +25 %.

addons.name: Tequila Moonrock
addons.description:
A drink invented in a modest Changwon bar.
Became a favourite of Ji-Woon's.
  • Increases Main Event duration by +50 %.

addons.name: On Target Single
addons.description:
An underground single produced by Ji-Woon before achieving fame.
Only the biggest NO SPIN fans collected this hidden gem.
  • Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Lucky Blade
addons.description:
The first throwing knife Ji-Woon ever owned.
Purchased by his father, he was expected to put on a show for those frequenting the family restaurant.
  • Increases Main Event duration by +0.2 seconds for each Blade Hit.

addons.name: Ji-Woon's Autograph
addons.description:
A signature from the celebrity known as The Trickster.
Sore as his wrist was after hundred of these, it was invigorating to know he was so in demand.
  • Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +1 Stack.

addons.name: Caged Heart Shoes
addons.description:
Shoes that Ji-Woon wore during the music video for One Caged Heart.
Allows for smooth, graceful movements of the point dance.
  • Moderately increases Throw State Movement speed by +2.5 %.

addons.name: Melodious Murder
addons.description:
An audio file of a victim's crisp, clear shriek as a blade opened her up.
Ji-Woon incorporated the sound into one of his more popular tracks.
  • Reduces Reload time at Lockers by -20 %.

addons.name: Waiting For You Watch
addons.description:
A pocket watch worn by Ji-Woon during a live performance of I'll Be Waiting For You.
It is a stage prop that does not work and never will.
  • Increases Main Event duration by +0.3 seconds for each Blade Hit.

addons.name: Ripper Brace
addons.description:
A wrist brace worn by Ji-Woon during the filming of his music video Ripper.
Though unintentional, the design stabilises the wrist better than many medical braces.
  • Increases Laceration Meter Decay delay by 3 seconds.

addons.name: Fizz-Spin Soda
addons.description:
A limited edition can of soda promoting NO SPIN.
High sugar and caffeine content.
  • Increases initial Throw rate of Blades by +2 Stacks.

addons.name: Bloody Boa
addons.description:
A boa that Ji-Woon draped around a victim's slashed neck.
A number of pockets are concealed within it.
  • Start with 8 extra Blades.
  • Increases Blade Carrying capacity by 8.

addons.name: Trick Blades
addons.description:
Specialty blades that are only seen as faulty by those who lack imagination.
A young Ji-Woon dazzled spectators with the trick he performed.
  • Allows Blades to ricochet off the environment twice.

addons.name: Edge of Revival Album
addons.description:
The Trickster's debut album.
The coarse and vicious tone was met with a mixed reaction from fans despite critical acclaim.
  • Blades shatter when hitting the environment, dealing 50 % Laceration to nearby Survivors.

addons.name: Diamond Cufflinks
addons.description:
Cufflinks gouged into the eyes of a sasaeng fan who made the mistake of stalking Ji-Woon.
Rubbing off the blood, there is so much to be seen in the glitter.
  • When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is one Blade Hit away from the maximum, their Aura is revealed for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Cut Thru U Single
addons.description:
The first single released by NO SPIN after Ji-Woon joined their ranks.
Scored an all-kill on the Korean charts.
  • Blades pierce through Survivors.
  • Subsequent Survivors hit by the same Blade receive 50 % Laceration.

addons.name: Iridescent Photocard
addons.description:
A glass-like photo moulded from The Fog itself.
Ji Woon's eyes shimmer holographically on his grinning face.
  • When a Survivor's Laceration Meter is two or one Blade Hits away from the maximum, they are inflicted with the Exposed Status Effect.

addons.name: Death Throes Compilation
addons.description:
A collection of the final sounds from Ji-Woon's victims, adapted to a vinyl record.
Terrifying and emotionally raw.
  • Exiting Main Event replenishes The Trickster's Blades.

addons.name: Visitor Wristband
addons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for visitors to the facility.
It also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases the Survivor Detection range of Zombies by +2 metres.
  • Increases the Field of View of Zombies by +10 °.

addons.name: S.T.A.R.S. Field Combat Manual
addons.description:
A manual of compiled S.T.A.R.S. close-range combat knowledge, edited by Chris Redfield.
  • After Zombies hit a Survivor, their Aura turns yellow for 6 seconds.

addons.name: Damaged Syringe
addons.description:
Medical equipment that fared poorly during the chaos that overwhelmed Raccoon City.
  • Increases Vaccine Injection time for Survivors by +2 seconds.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration after a Survivors uses a Vaccine by +1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Brian's Intestine
addons.description:
The small intestine of Brian Irons, chief of the RPD.
It is an appetising sight for zombies.
  • Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.25 m/s.

addons.name: Zombie Heart
addons.description:
The heart of an eviscerated zombie.
It is considered hazardous waste as it is certainly teeming with viruses.
  • Increases Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +0.5 Contamination Points.

addons.name: Mikhail's Eye
addons.description:
While little was left of Mikhail, his left eyeball survived the blast that killed him.
It remains a tasty treat for zombies.
  • Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.35 m/s.

addons.name: Marvin's Blood
addons.description:
The contaminated blood of a Raccoon City Police Officer.
  • Increases Mutation Rate when hitting Survivors with a Tentacle Strike by +0.75 Mutation Points.

addons.name: Adrenaline Injector
addons.description:
A hormone that heightens senses and prepares the body to fight.
  • Increases Killer Instinct duration after a Survivors uses a Vaccine by +3 seconds.

addons.name: Admin Wristband
addons.description:
An electronic Umbrella wristband for administrators of the facility.
While allowing access to secure areas, it also doubles as a tracking device.
  • Increases the Survivor Detection range of Zombies by +4 metres.
  • Increases the Field of View of Zombies by +17.5 °.

addons.name: Tyrant Gore
addons.description:
A damaged sample from a T-002 Tyrant that died in combat.
There are signs of severe burns.
  • Increases Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +0.5 Contamination Points.
  • Reduces Zombie Respawn time by -5 seconds.

addons.name: T-Virus Sample
addons.description:
A sample of the T-Virus developed by Umbrella Corporation, it causes extreme mutations and brain damage in its subjects.
  • Increases Mutation Rate when destroying Zombies with a Tentacle Strike by +1 Contamination Point.

addons.name: Serotonin Injector
addons.description:
A hormone that slightly relaxes the user for when stealth is required.
  • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 15 seconds, when a Zombie is destroyed.

addons.name: Plant 43 Vines
addons.description:
The tangled remnants of a plant infected with the T-Virus, it killed one of the researchers who developed it.
  • Increases Supply Case Opening time for Survivors by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Licker Tongue
addons.description:
A sticky prehensile tongue that easily wraps around anything it touches.
  • Increases Hindered Status Effect duration after becoming Contaminated by +0.2 seconds.

addons.name: NE-a Parasite
addons.description:
A parasite used in the development of Nemesis T-Types, it is capable of hijacking its host's brain.
  • When becoming Contaminated, Survivors suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Jill's Sandwich
addons.description:
It is tragically squished and dripping with blood from a recent battle.
Despite that, it has a delicious aroma that cannot be missed.
  • After a Survivor unlocks a Supply Case, their Aura is revealed to The Nemesis for 12 seconds.

addons.name: Depleted Ink Ribbon
addons.description:
Who will save them now? There is something about this ink ribbon being dry that energises zombies.
  • Reduces Zombie Respawn time by -5 seconds.
  • Increases Zombie Movement speed by +0.5 m/s.
  • Once all 5 Generators are completed, any destroyed Zombies respawn in an Exit Gate area.

addons.name: Broken Recovery Coin
addons.description:
A coin depicting a bird framed by a laurel wreath.
It is broken in half.
  • Removes 1 Supply Case from the Trial.

addons.name: Shattered S.T.A.R.S. Badge
addons.description:
A symbol of hope for Raccoon City, utterly destroyed.
  • Increases Zombie Movement speed by +1.5 m/s for 60 seconds whenever a Generator is completed.

addons.name: Iridescent Umbrella Badge
addons.description:
A glass-like badge moulded from The Fog itself.
It represents a corporation that pushed far beyond ethical and humane science.
  • After using a Vaccine, Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Leather Strip
addons.description:
Leather strips torn from a Cenobite's uniform, allowing for the mutilation of exposed flesh.
  • Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.15 seconds.

addons.name: Lively Crickets
addons.description:
Insects which scarcely avoided being eaten by a mysterious drifter.
  • Increases Possessed Chain Turn rate by +10 %.

addons.name: Burning Candle
addons.description:
A candle lit by Frank Cotton during a fatal summoning ceremony.
  • Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -3 seconds.

addons.name: Bent Nail
addons.description:
A simple nail that cut deep into Larry Cotton's hand.
Though the damage was superficial, it set into motion a horrifying set of events.
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for Chain Bound Score Event in the Deviousness Category.
  • Hits with Possessed Chains only spawn 1 additional Chain.

addons.name: Wriggling Maggots
addons.description:
Larvae that poured from the mouth of a corpse hidden in the Cotton household.
  • Increases Possessed Chains Turn rate by +15 %.

addons.name: Spoiled Meal
addons.description:
A pile of mould, feasted on by a cockroach.
Perhaps a sign of Frank Cotton's mysterious disappearance...
  • Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +2 metres.

addons.name: Skewered Rat
addons.description:
A crude solution for the Cotton home's rat problem.
  • Reduces Summons of Pain cool-down by -0.45 seconds.

addons.name: Liquified Gore
addons.description:
The result of summoning the Cenobites.
There is no telling what part of the human body this belonged to.
  • Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +1 second.

addons.name: Flickering Television
addons.description:
A television that acted strangely upon the arrival of the Cenobites.
  • Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +4 metres.

addons.name: Torture Pillar
addons.description:
A dangling slab covered in the gore of past victims.
  • Reduces Chain Hunt Activation time by -6 seconds.

addons.name: Slice of Frank
addons.description:
A slab of Frank's face after his torture at the hand of the Cenobites.
  • Survivors carrying the Lament Configuration suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

addons.name: Larry's Remains
addons.description:
The skeletal remains of Larry Cotton, covered in a thick, sticky layer of blood.
  • Increases Lament Configuration Solving time by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Larry's Blood
addons.description:
The blood of Larry Cotton, which partially resurrected his brother Frank.
  • Increases maximum Possessed Chains Travel distance by +4 metres.

addons.name: Frank's Heart
addons.description:
The beating heart of Frank, given life from his brother's blood.
  • Increases maximum Gateway Casting distance by +8 metres.

addons.name: Original Pain
addons.description:
The first pin pushed into Pinhead's skull.
Such pleasure and pain.
  • Survivors who break free of Possessed Chains suffer from the Deep Wound Status Effect

addons.name: Impaling Wire
addons.description:
A wire that pierces the cheeks of a Cenobite, while revealing the gaping wound on her neck.
  • Summons 1 additional Chain if a Survivor uses the environment to break a Chain.

addons.name: Greasy Black Lens
addons.description:
A lens from the sunglasses of an obese Cenobite whose fleshy rolls droop down his face and neck.
  • Reveals Survivors hit by Possessed Chains for 6 seconds

addons.name: Chatterer's Tooth
addons.description:
A fragment from a Cenobite whose mouth chatters endlessly.
This tooth, having broken from his jaw, is finally silent.
  • Reveals the Lament Configuration to The Cenobite.
  • Picking up the Lament Configuration has the following effects:
    • Deactivates an on-going Chain Hunt.
    • Gain the Undetectable Status Effect for 25 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Lament Configuration
addons.description:
A glass-like puzzle box moulded from The Fog itself.
This replica differs from the original, providing altogether new powers.
  • While a Chain Hunt is inactive, Survivors beyond 24 metres of the Lament Configuration cannot see its Aura.

addons.name: Engineer's Fang
addons.description:
A sharp tooth from the maw of a fleshy, scorpion-like creature, known to accompany Cenobites on their grim undertakings.
  • Possessed Chains injure Healthy Survivors, but do not bind them or spawn additional Chains.
  • Increases Gateway Closing time after hitting a healthy Survivor with a Possessed Chain by +0.25 seconds.
  • When hitting an injured Survivor with a Possessed Chain, only 1 additional Chain will spawn.

addons.name: Vibrant Obituary
addons.description:
Scrap newspaper, speckled with bright, eye-catching paint.
It seems tragedy is a daily thing.
  • Increases the Killer Instinct duration of Dire Crows by +1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Thick Tar
addons.description:
Sticky, viscous sludge that Carmina used for an experimental piece.
Once it sticks to skin, it is nearly impossible to get off.
  • Increases the time required by Survivors to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm by +0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Oil Paints
addons.description:
There is little left but a few globs of black and grey, yet Carmina could paint an expansive landscape with them.
  • Increases the Killer Instinct Detection radius of Dire Crows by +1.5 metres.

addons.name: Choclo Corn
addons.description:
A type of corn common in South America.
A few kernels are reason enough for a crow to stop for a snack.
  • Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Velvet Fabric
addons.description:
A striking red fabric Carmina used on an art project.
Its brightness contrasted against black feathers.
  • When a Survivor attempts to Repel a Dire Crow Swarm, the Swarm's Aura remains visible for another 1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Untitled Agony
addons.description:
A canvas that was targeted with swipes and trashes of black paint following Matias' death.
It radiates with heavy, crippling sorrow.
  • Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Still Life Crow
addons.description:
An ink drawing of a dead crow.
Carmina's sadness over its death can be felt with each dark line.
  • Increases the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Festering Carrion
addons.description:
A stomach-churning pile of meat and guts, yet it attracts hungry crows craving a bite.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow takes flight by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Automatic Drawing
addons.description:
An experimental drawing Carmina made without conscious planning.
Do not think — act.
  • Reduces the Cool-down time of Birds of Torment after a Dire Crow disintegrates from inactivity by -1.5 seconds.

addons.name: Thorny Nest
addons.description:
A nest that remained empty near Carmina's home.
There are sharp thorns embedded in it.
  • Survivors damaged by Dire Crows suffer from the Haemorrhage and Mangled Status Effects.

addons.name: Silver Bell
addons.description:
A shiny trinket that a crow took a liking to.
The clinking of the bell was a distraction to everyone but Carmina.
  • Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.

addons.name: O Grief, O Lover
addons.description:
An abstract ink drawing that Carmina drew before walking to the Death Leap.
  • Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Exhausted Status Effect.

addons.name: Darkest Ink
addons.description:
An unnatural ink, so wretched and dark that it seems to pull in light around it.
  • Survivors swarmed by Dire Crows suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
    • This effect persists for 15 seconds after Dire Crows are repelled from the Survivor.

addons.name: Charcoal Stick
addons.description:
A stick of charcoal that conceals anything it rubs over.
  • The Auras of flying Dire Crows are no longer visible.
  • The Auras of Dire Crows are visible for 0.5 seconds upon being summoned.

addons.name: Severed Tongue
addons.description:
Carmina's tongue, cut from her mouth shortly before her death.
The sight instils rage not just in her, but in her crows.
  • Reduces the Slow-down duration of The Artist when Dire Crows take flight by -0.5 seconds.

addons.name: Severed Hands
addons.description:
Carmina's severed hands, cut from her arms shortly before her death.
The sight brings sheer fury to her and her protectors.
  • Any Survivor within 3 metres of a Survivor, who is being swarmed by Dire Crows, will also be swarmed.

addons.name: Matias' Baby Shoes
addons.description:
A grieving reminder to Carmina that Matias would be with her, always watching.
  • The Auras of Survivors within 5 metres of an idle Dire Crow are revealed to you for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Ink Egg
addons.description:
An unusual egg that seems to be nothing but a ball of semi-solid ink.
  • Increases the number of Dire Crows The Artist is able to hold by +1 Dire Crow.
  • Reduces the Idle time of Dire Crows before they disintegrate by +4 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Feather
addons.description:
A glass-like feather moulded from The Fog itself.
Simple as it may be, it is a symbol of those who watch over Carmina.
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect whenever Birds of Torment is on Cool-down and The Artist holds no Dire Crows.
  • Reduces the number of Dire Crows The Artist is able to hold by -1 Dire Crow.

addons.name: Garden of Rot
addons.description:
A nude self-portrait in which Carmina depicts a rotting darkness growing outwards from within.
  • When a Survivor completes the Repel action, they suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 4 seconds.

addons.name: Videotape Copy
addons.description:
A copy of the deadly videotape imprinted upon by Sadako.
It dampens the desire for vengeance.
  • Projection does not inflict Condemned on nearby Survivors.
  • Grants 100 % Bonus Bloodpoints for Deluge of Fear Score Events.

addons.name: Old Newspaper
addons.description:
It tells of a local woman who predicted a volcanic eruption, evidence used to initially find Sadako.
  • Increases the invisibility duration after Manifesting by +33 %.

addons.name: Mother's Mirror
addons.description:
A mirror from Sadako's mother's house.
A reminder of what Sadako has lost.
  • Increases the duration of the intermittent visibility phase after Manifesting by +2 seconds.

addons.name: Cabin Sign
addons.description:
The cabin where both Tomoko and Reiko watched the tape.
Carries the memory of those first curses.
  • Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after Projection by -12 seconds.

addons.name: Yoichi's Fishing Net
addons.description:
The net Yoichi used while fishing with his grandfather.
A reminder that death comes to us all.
  • Reduces the time it takes Survivors to acquire another stack of Condemned by -12 % when holding a VHS Tape.

addons.name: Well Stone
addons.description:
A piece of the well where Sadako was trapped, an image burned into the mind of all those who have watched the tape.
  • Reduces the time it takes for a TV to turn on after having been turned off by a Survivor by -6 seconds.

addons.name: Sea-Soaked Cloth
addons.description:
The hood worn by the mysterious figure in the tape.
Makes those near it unable to trust what they see.
  • Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Blindness Status Effect.
    • This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

addons.name: Reiko's Watch
addons.description:
The watch that Reiko left her son Yoichi.
A distracting and constant reminder of one's impending doom.
  • Increases the invisibility duration while Demanifested by +50 %.

addons.name: Clump of Hair
addons.description:
Once beautiful and long, Sadako now hides behind her ragged, matted locks.
  • Reduces the range at which The Onryō is visible while Demanifested by -6 metres.

addons.name: Well Water
addons.description:
Water from the well where Sadako was left to die.
Murky and black, it obscures everything around it.
  • Increases the duration of the Undetectable Status Effect by +2 seconds when Manifesting by any means.

addons.name: Ring Drawing
addons.description:
A drawing of the view from inside the well, as drawn by a young Yoichi.
Helping those cursed by the tape can only bring misfortune.
  • Condemned Survivors spread their Condemnation to other Survivors, who complete a Healing action on them.

addons.name: Rickety Pinwheel
addons.description:
A pinwheel found in the caves of Izu Oshima.
It spins even when there is no wind, disorienting those who see or hear it.
  • Survivors within 8 metres of a powered TV suffer from the Oblivious Status Effect.
    • This effect lingers for 7 seconds after the TV is turned off.

addons.name: Mother's Comb
addons.description:
The comb Sadako's mother used in the tape.
Sadako's psychic abilities are enhanced when she focuses on it.
  • Reveals the Aura of any TV being turned off in yellow.

addons.name: Bloody Fingernails
addons.description:
Sadako's bloody fingernails, lost as she tried to claw her way out of the well.
Evidence of her single-minded need to kill.
  • Increases the duration of the Post-Projection Movement Speed boost by +50 %.

addons.name: VCR
addons.description:
The original VCR that played Sadako's tape.
It is still warm to the touch.
  • All TVs play the Projection effects when The Onryō Projects to a TV.

addons.name: Telephone
addons.description:
After watching the video, victims receive a phone call.
They are frozen in fear as they realise they have seven days left to live.
  • Survivors witnessing a Manifestation from within 7 metres suffer from the Hindered Status Effect for 3 seconds.

addons.name: Tape Editing Deck
addons.description:
The editing deck used by Reiko and Ryuji to analyse and copy the tape.
Copying and sharing the tape is the only way to survive the curse.
  • Each Survivor starts the Trial with a VHS Tape in their possession, and their highlighted TV is the one farthest from their location.

addons.name: Distorted Photo
addons.description:
Those who have watched the tape find all photos of themselves distorted, a reminder of their impending doom.
  • Survivors witnessing a Manifestation from within 16 metres will scream, revealing their location for 4 seconds.

addons.name: Remote Control
addons.description:
A remote for the VCR at the cabin.
It allows Sadako to focus on those enemies at a distance.
  • After using Projection, the Auras of Survivors, who are within 16 metres of a TV and carrying a VHS Tape, are revealed to you for 7 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Videotape
addons.description:
The original tape containing Sadako's curse.
  • Hitting a Survivor within 8 seconds after Manifesting turns on the last 4 TVs turned off by Projection.

addons.name: Wooden Plank
addons.description:
A wooden plank torn from the stage where Otto Stamper sacrificed a meddling journalist.
  • Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for hooking a Survivor by +25 %.

addons.name: Mortar and Pestle
addons.description:
Disconnected from the world and modern medicine, Stamper's followers originally had to make do with the flora local to the island.
  • The Dredge emerges from the Remnant facing the same direction as a Teleport is activated instead of facing the direction the Remnant was placed in.

addons.name: Follower's Cowl
addons.description:
They believed the cowls proved their enlightenment, but they merely kept them in darkness.
  • Teleporting back to the Remnant will activate Killer Instinct during Daytime as well.

addons.name: Caffeine Tablets
addons.description:
Stamper's followers were told not to sleep, or they would bring the wrath of Druanee upon them.
Towards the end, he brought in drugs from the mainland.
  • The Auras of locked Lockers are visible to you in yellow while charging The Gloaming or teleporting.

addons.name: Malthinker's Skull
addons.description:
Those who brought negativity to the commune would mysteriously disappear from time to time.
Their remains were never found... until The Dredge brought them up.
  • Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for when Survivors are injured by +66 % per second.

addons.name: Haddie's Calendar
addons.description:
She planned to cross out each day until her parents took her to India, but when tragedy struck, she abandoned her calendar.
  • Reduces the time to exit a Locker by -1 second.

addons.name: Fallen Shingle
addons.description:
After the Ottomarians were subsumed by The Dredge, the mansion fell into disrepair.
  • Increases the Nightfall Meter Charge rate for using Reign of Darkness by +15 % per second.

addons.name: Burnt Letters
addons.description:
Some followers tried to write letters home.
Stamper ensured that nobody would have contact with the outside world.
  • Increases the number of Charges added to the Nightfall Meter for injuring a Survivor by +25 %.

addons.name: Air Freshener
addons.description:
After her parents were found, this was in the bag of belongings the police returned.
Haddie does not know why she keeps it.
  • Start the Trial with 4 Power Tokens.

addons.name: Worry Stone
addons.description:
While the Ottomarians were told to think only positive thoughts, some kept these stones in their pockets to rub when negative thoughts arose.
  • Reveals the Aura of a Survivor for 6 seconds when they lock a Locker.

addons.name: War Helmet
addons.description:
While investigating an Overlap in the Alps, she found an abandoned war bunker. She took a helmet from it after the Overlap nearly took her.
  • Increases the duration of Killer Instinct by +1.5 seconds during Nightfall.

addons.name: Ottomarian Writing
addons.description:
The words of Otto Stamper were the only words available for his followers to read, decrying malthink and malspeak.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -4 seconds during Nightfall.

addons.name: Destroyed Pillow
addons.description:
While not allowed to sleep, leaders amongst the Ottomarians tore sleeping supplies to shreds to prevent malthinkers from sneaking off to nap.
  • Reduces the Cool-down duration of The Gloaming by -2.5 seconds during Nightfall.

addons.name: Broken Doll
addons.description:
Followers brought their families to live in a utopia.
None of them were spared.
  • Increases the duration of Nightfall by 20 seconds.

addons.name: Tilling Blade
addons.description:
The island was self-sufficient, and followers tilled the tough soil to grow crops during the warm season.
  • Healthy Survivors injured during Nightfall suffer from the Blindness, Haemorrhage, and the Mangled Status Effects for 60 seconds.

addons.name: Lavalier Microphone
addons.description:
She kept a lavalier mic nearby, allowing her to record her innermost feelings when under great stress.
  • Consuming the last Power Token will reveal the Auras of all Survivors for 3 seconds.
  • Entering a Locker through teleportation causes all Lockers within 6 metres of any Survivor to open and slam their doors.

addons.name: Field Recorder
addons.description:
Haddie documented all of her forays near Overlaps, to prove not only to the world but herself what she saw and felt.
  • Nightfall is active at the start of the Trial.
  • Nightfall activates automatically when the final Generator IconHelpLoading generators.png is completed.
  • Any Survivor coming into contact with the Remnant suffers from the Exhausted Status Effect for 15 seconds.

addons.name: Boat Key
addons.description:
Only one boat allowed people on and off the island, and the keys were hidden away to prevent deserters.
  • Increases the Teleportation speed by +25 % during Daytime.
  • When all Generators are completed, all active Locks are instantly broken.

addons.name: Sacrificial Knife
addons.description:
When a journalist attempted to warn the Ottomarians of Stamper's true task, he slit her throat as a warning to any dissenters.
  • Exiting a Locker during Nightfall blocks all Vault locations within 16 metres of it for 5 seconds.

addons.name: Iridescent Wooden Plank
addons.description:
Once the journalist's blood stained the wooden boards of the stage, everything was set into motion for The Dredge's arrival.
  • Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for the final 12 seconds of Nightfall.

perks.name: A Nurse's Calling
perks.description:
Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability.
  • The Auras of Survivors, who are healing or being healed, are revealed to you when they are within a range of 20/24/28 metres.

perks.name: Agitation
perks.description:
You get excited in anticipation of hooking your prey.
While carrying a Survivor you benefit from the following effects:
  • Increases your Carrying Movement speed by 6/12/18 %.
  • Increases your Terror Radius by 12 metres.

perks.name: Bamboozle
perks.description:
Performing a Vault action is 5/10/15 % faster and calls upon The Entity to block that Vault location for Survivors for 8/12/16 seconds .
Only one Vault location may be blocked this way at any given time. Bamboozle does not affect Pallets.

perks.name: Barbecue & Chilli
perks.description:
A deep bond with The Entity unlocks potential in one's Aura-reading ability.
  • After hooking a Survivor, all Survivors who are at least 60/50/40 metres away from that Hook have their Aura revealed to you for 4 seconds.

perks.name: Beast of Prey
perks.description:
Your lust for a kill is so intense that your connection with The Entity is momentarily lost, making you totally unpredictable.
Upon gaining the Bloodlust Status Effect, Beast of Prey activates:
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for as long as Bloodlust is active.
Beast of Prey grants 30/40/50 % bonus Bloodpoints for actions in the Hunter Category.
The bonus Bloodpoints are only awarded during the Trial.

perks.name: Bitter Murmur
perks.description:
Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
  • Each time a Generator is completed, the Auras of all Survivors within 16 metres of that Generator are revealed to you for 5 seconds.
  • Once the last Generator is completed, the Auras of all Survivors are revealed to you for 5/7/10 seconds.

perks.name: Blood Echo
perks.description:
The agony of one is inflicted onto others.
  • When hooking a Survivor, all other Injured Survivors suffer from the Haemorrhage and Exhausted Status Effects for 45 seconds.
Blood Echo can only be triggered once every 80/70/60 seconds.

perks.name: Blood Warden
perks.description:
As soon as one Exit Gate is opened, Blood Warden activates.
  • The Auras of Survivors standing within the Exit-Gate area are revealed to you.
Once per Trial, hooking a Survivor while Blood Warden is active calls upon The Entity to block the exits for all Survivors for 30/40/60 seconds.

perks.name: Bloodhound
perks.description:
Like a hunting scent hound, you smell traces of blood at a great distance.
  • Pools of Blood are shown in bright red and can be tracked for 2/3/4 seconds longer than normal.

perks.name: Brutal Strength
perks.description:
Your great strength allows you to shred through your prey's defences.
  • Increases the Action speed of breaking Pallets and Breakable Walls, and damaging Generators by 10/15/20 %.

perks.name: Call of Brine
perks.description:
Your psychic abilities influence technology in devastating ways.
After damaging a Generator, Call of Brine activates for 60 seconds.
  • The Generator regresses at 150/175/200 % of the normal Regression speed and its AuraIconHelp auras.png is revealed to you .
  • Each time a Survivor completes a Good Skill Check on a Generator affected by Call of Brine, you receive a Loud Noise Notification .

perks.name: Claustrophobia
perks.description:
Your ties to the Entity manifest when your prey attempts to get away.
Whenever a Generator is completed, all Windows and Vault locations within 32 metres of it become blocked for all Survivors for the next 20/25/30 seconds.
  • The Auras of the block Vault locations are revealed to you for the duration.

perks.name: Corrupt Intervention
perks.description:
Your prayers invoke a dark power that meddles with the Survivors' chances of survival.
  • At the start of the Trial, the 3 Generators located farthest from you are blocked by The Entity for 80/100/120 seconds.
Corrupt Intervention deactivates prematurely once the first Survivor is put into the Dying State.

perks.name: Coulrophobia
perks.description:
Your presence alone instils great fear.
  • Reduces the Healing speed by 30/40/50 %
  • Increases the Rotation speed of Healing Skill Checks by +50 %

perks.name: Coup de Grâce
perks.description:
As the end nears, you go in for the kill.
Each time a Generator is completed, Coup de Grâce grows in power and gains 1 Token.
  • Consume 1 Token to increase the distance of your next Lunge Attack by 70/75/80 %.

perks.name: Dark Devotion
perks.description:
The display of your Powers creates a whirlwind of panic that spreads throughout the land.
You become obsessed with one Survivor.
Whenever the Obsession loses a Health State by any means and thus enters the Injured State, Dark Devotion activates:
  • Your Terror Radius transfers to the Obsession for 20/25/30 seconds, and its radius is set to 32 metres
  • Grants the Undetectable Status Effect for the same duration.
The Obsession with your transferred Terror Radius is also considered to be 'inside the Terror Radius' for other purposes.
You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

perks.name: Darkness Revealed
perks.description:
In your presence, places once thought to be safe are perhaps the most dangerous.
  • When you search a Locker, the Auras of all Survivors within 8 metres of any Locker are revealed to you for 3/4/5 seconds.
Darkness Revealed has a cool-down of 30 seconds.

perks.name: Dead Man's Switch
perks.description:
After hooking a Survivor, Dead Man's Switch activates for the next 35/40/45 seconds:
  • While activated, any Survivor that stops repairing a Generator before it is fully repaired causes The Entity to block the Generator until Dead Man's Switch 's effect ends.
  • Affected Generators are highlighted by a white Aura.

perks.name: Deadlock
perks.description:
You induce mental suffering by crushing any hope of escape.
Whenever a Generator is completed, The Entity blocks the Generator with the most progression for 20/25/30 seconds.
  • The Aura of the blocked Generator is revealed to you in white during this time.

perks.name: Deathbound
perks.description:
Those whose lives are intertwined in darkness are destined to suffer together.
When a Survivor heals another Survivor for the equivalent of 1 Health State at least 32 metres away from you, that Survivor will scream, revealing their location and activating Deathbound:
  • For the next 60 seconds, that Survivor suffers from the Oblivious Status Effect when farther than 16/12/8 metres away from the healed Survivor.

perks.name: Deerstalker
perks.description:
Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability:
  • The Auras of all Survivors in the Dying State within 20/28/36 metres of your location are revealed to you .

perks.name: Discordance
perks.description:
Any Generator within a range of 64/96/128 metres that is being repaired by 2 or more Survivors is marked by a yellow Aura .
  • When the Generator is first highlighted, Discordance triggers a Loud Noise Notification on the Generator.
  • After the Generator is no longer within range or is being repaired by just 1 Survivor , the highlighted Aura will linger for another 4 seconds.

perks.name: Dissolution
perks.description:
Everything turns to dust. It is as inescapable as the coming of the night.
3 seconds after injuring a Survivor by any means, Dissolution activates for 12/16/19 seconds:
  • While Dissolution is active, if a Survivor fast vaults over a Pallet while they are inside your Terror Radius, The Entity will break the Pallet at the end of the vault, deactivating Dissolution.

perks.name: Distressing
perks.description:
Your horrifying emanation strikes at a supernaturally long distance.
  • Increases your Terror Radius by 22/24/26 %
  • Grants 100 % bonus Bloodpoints for all actions in the Deviousness Category.

perks.name: Dragon's Grip
perks.description:
After kicking a Generator, for the next 30 seconds, the first Survivor interacting with it will scream, revealing their location for 4 seconds, and suffers from the Exposed Status Effect for 60 seconds.
Dragon's Grip has a cool-down of 120/100/80 seconds.

perks.name: Dying Light
perks.description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor.
Each time you hook a Survivor other than your Obsession, you gain 1 Token:
  • For as long as the Obsession is alive, all other Survivors suffer from a stack-able 2/2.5/3 % penalty to Repairing, Healing, and Sabotaging speeds per Token, up to a maximum of 22/27.5/33 % or 11 Tokens.
  • The Obsession is unaffected by this penalty and instead granted a permanent 33 % Action Speed bonus to Unhooking and Healing other Survivors.
You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

perks.name: Enduring
perks.description:
You are resilient to pain.
  • Reduces Pallet Stun duration by 40/45/50 %.

perks.name: Eruption
perks.description:
The NE-α parasite provides you with the intelligence and awareness needed to set a trap.
After kicking a Generator, its Aura is highlighted in yellow.
  • When you put a Survivor into the Dying State by any means, every affected Generator explodes and starts regressing, removing the highlighted Aura.
    • Applies an immediate -10 % Progression penalty.
  • Any Survivor repairing a Generator when it explodes will scream and suffer from the Incapacitated Status Effect for 15/20/25 seconds.
Eruption has a cool-down of 30 seconds.

perks.name: Fearmonger
perks.description:
Your distressing presence drains and weakens your prey. Whenever a Survivor is repairing a Generator, they suffer from the Blindness and Exhausted Status Effects .
  • If the Survivor is already Exhausted, their Status Effect's timer will be paused.
  • The Status Effect lingers for 3/4/5 seconds after the Survivor stops repairing.

perks.name: Fire Up
perks.description:
The increased pressure of losing your preys fills you with anger and gives you unsuspected motivation.
Each time a Generator is completed, Fire Up grows in power.
  • Gain a stack-able 3/3.5/4 % Action Speed bonus to picking-up and dropping Survivors, breaking Pallets and Breakable Walls, damaging Generators, and vaulting Windows, up to a maximum of 15/17.5/20 %.

perks.name: Forced Penance
perks.description: Those who stand in the way of duty will suffer harsh judgement. Survivors who take a Protection Hit suffer from the Broken Status Effect for the next 60/70/80 seconds.

perks.name: Franklin's Demise
perks.description:
Your vicious Basic Attacks make Survivors drop their Items on impact.
  • If not recovered within 150/120/90 seconds, the lost Items will have their Charges depleted by The Entity
  • The Auras of lost Items are revealed to you within 32 metres and slowly fade from white to red as the timer elapses.

perks.name: Furtive Chase
perks.description:
You become obsessed with one Survivor.
You lurk in the shadows, eliminating your victims one by one.
Each time you hook your Obsession, you gain 1 Token, up to a maximum of 2/3/4 Tokens:
  • While in a Chase, your Terror Radius is reduced by 4 metres per accumulated Token.
  • When a Survivor rescues the Obsession from the Hook, that Survivor will become the new Obsession.
You can only be obsessed with one Survivor at a time.

perks.name: Gearhead
perks.description:
You have got an ear for well-oiled gears.
After a Survivor loses a Health State, Gearhead activates:
  • While Gearhead is active, a Survivor succeeding a Great Skill Check while repairing reveals their Aura to you for 6/8/10 seconds, after which Gearhead deactivates .

perks.name: Grim Embrace
perks.description:
Your act of servitude to The Entity has not gone unnoticed.
Each time a Survivor is hooked for the first time, Grim Embrace gains a Token.
Upon reaching 4 Tokens Grim Embrace activates:
  • The Entity blocks all Generators for 30/35/40 seconds.
  • The Aura of the Obsession is revealed to you for 5 seconds.

perks.name: Hangman's Trick
perks.description:
Unlocks potential in your Aura-reading ability and your ingenious modifications to Hooks alert you of tampering.
  • Gain a Loud Noise Notification whenever a Survivor begins sabotaging a Hook.
  • While carrying a Survivor, see the Aura of any Survivor within 2/4/6 metres of any Hook.

perks.name: Hex: Blood Favour
perks.description:
A Hex that gains the favour of The Entity when blood is spilt.
  • Whenever a Survivor loses a Health State by any means and thus enters the Injured State, Hex: Blood Favour calls upon The Entity to block all Pallets within 24/28/32 metres of that Survivor's location from being pulled down for the next 15 seconds.
The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

perks.name: Hex: Crowd Control
perks.description:
A Hex that ensures those lesser than you are properly herded.
Survivors who perform a rushed vault through a Window prompt The Entity to block it for the next 14/17/20 seconds.
The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

perks.name: Hex: Devour Hope
perks.description:
A Hex rooting its power on hope.
The false hope of Survivors ignites your hunger.
Each time a Survivor is rescued from a Hook when you are at least 24 metres away, Hex: Devour Hope receives 1 Token:
  • 2 Tokens: 10 seconds after hooking a Survivor, gain a 3/4/5 % Haste Status Effect for the next 10 seconds.
  • 3 Tokens: Survivors suffer permanently from the Exposed Status Effect.
  • 5 Tokens: You are granted the ability to kill all Survivors by your own hand.
The Hex effects persist as long as the related Hex Totem is standing.

perks.name: Hex: Haunted Ground
perks.description:
Two trapped Hex Totems will spawn in the Trial Grounds.
  • When either Hex Totem is cleansed or blessed, all Survivors suffer from the Exposed Status Effect for 40/50/60 seconds.
  • The second Hex Totem will immediately turn into a Dull Totem.

perks.name: Hex: Huntress Lullaby
perks.description:
A Hex rooting its power in despair.
Your hunt is an irresistible song of dread which muddles your prey's attention.
Survivors recieve a 2/4/6 % Regression penalty on Failed Skill Checks for Repair and Healing actions.
Hex: Huntress Lullaby grows in power each time you Hook a Survivor, gaining 1 Token, and affecting Repair and Healing Skill Checks:
  • 1 Token: shortens the time between the Warning sound and the Skill check by -14 %.
  • 2 Tokens: shortens the time between the Warning sound and the Skill check by -28 %.
  • 3 Tokens: shortens the time between the Warning sound and the Skill check by -42 %.
